name: cleaning_start
description: This function is used to start cleaning a specified area with a robot vacuum cleaner.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located. e.g. home, office, etc.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.  e.g. living room, bedroom, bathroom, etc.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to be used for cleaning.

parameters.name: rvcLocations
parameters.description: The list of locations to be cleaned. e.g. living room, bedroom, etc.

parameters.name: rvcObjects
parameters.description: The list of objects, near to which cleaning needs to be done. e.g. AC, TV, washing machine, etc.

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: The cleaning mode to be used.
